item.title: Real Time Surf Notifications in R
item.description: “You surf in Lake Michigan?!” Three years ago, I rented a board on a whim from a local shop. The 75 degree, clear late summer day reminded me of far away tropical places like Hawaii and Puerto Rico. I was hooked. After a few years of getting forecasts and conditions wrong, I decided to take the notifications and forecasting into my own hands, so I put mmy data science skills to work to build something better.
